description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Small Craft Harbors Branch (SCH) has a requirement for the provision of Electrical Equipment for the Pacific Region
full_summary:
Title: F1571-220203: Electrical Equipment for DFO Small Craft Harbors Branch
===========================================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
---------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS3670272894
**Publication Date:** November 2, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 30, 2022, 14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) No. WS3670272894 for the provision of electrical equipment to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Small Craft Harbors Branch (SCH).

**Background**
------------

The SCH requires electrical equipment to support its operations in the Pacific Region. The Work covered under this solicitation includes the supply, fabrication, assembly, and delivery of electrical equipment to Steveston Harbor, BC.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of work encompasses the supply of the following electrical equipment:

* Electrical components
* Electrical wire
* Electrical cable and accessories

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contracting and Notice Information**
--------------------------------------

The contracting entity for this solicitation is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

* Contact Information for Daphne Yu, analyst, can be found at [daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* The official solicitation notice can be accessed at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14519783?extsite=MTQ1MTk3ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery
